meanings.definition: Made by blowing air through a tube to shape molten glass.
meanings.sent1: The handblown glass vase sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: I bought a beautiful handblown ornament for my shelf.
meanings.sent3: The handblown chandelier swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes widened at the sight of the handblown glass sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The delicate handblown glass seemed to dance with light.

meanings.definition: Created using the technique of blowing air through a tube to shape molten glass.
meanings.sent1: The artisan proudly displayed his latest handblown creation.
meanings.sent2: The museum had a stunning collection of handblown pieces.
meanings.sent3: The handblown glassware clinked merrily at the dinner party.
meanings.sent4: The market was filled with colorful handblown trinkets.
meanings.sent5: The art show featured intricate handblown sculptures.
